meanings.definition: The act or process of congealing.
meanings.sent1: The congelations of the ice cream made it hard to scoop.
meanings.sent2: The congelations of the jelly turned it into a solid block.
meanings.sent3: The congelations of the pudding were so firm, it felt like cutting through a rock.
meanings.sent4: The congelations of the wax formed intricate patterns as it cooled.
meanings.sent5: The congelations of the glue held the pieces together tightly.

meanings.sent1: The congelations of the chocolate created a crunchy texture.
meanings.sent2: The congelations of the snow made it difficult to walk through.
meanings.sent3: The congelations of the juice in the freezer looked like colorful ice cubes.
meanings.sent4: The congelations of the metal were so cold, they stuck to the skin.
meanings.sent5: The congelations of the water formed beautiful icicles on the roof.
